sentences.english: Because I thought it was cool, since I am into technology and other geeky things.
sentences.chinese: 由於我癡迷科技和極客的東西，我認爲它很酷。

sentences.english: Does he feel responsible for perpetrating the new supremacy of the geek?
sentences.chinese: 我問他有沒有覺得要爲當下颳起的極客風付上點責任？

sentences.english: The average person may envision IT as the home of the geek.
sentences.chinese: 普通人也許會把IT視爲極客之家。

sentences.english: Engineers and geeks, or business people?
sentences.chinese: 服務於工程師和極客，還是商人？

sentences.english: Bitcoin has got geeks excited. What about economists?
sentences.chinese: 比特幣讓極客興奮不已。經濟學家怎麼看？

sentences.english: Next, they enlist the assistance of the local computer geek on staff.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，他們會在當地職員中徵集計算機極客的協助。

sentences.english: The guitar shirt is a product that really crossed over from meekness to a mainstream product.
sentences.chinese: 吉他T恤是一款跨越極客走向主流的產品。

sentences.english: First of all, the definition of geek has changed.
sentences.chinese: 首先，極客的定義已經發生了改變。

sentences.english: The word "geek" originally meant someone eccentric or outside of the mainstream.
sentences.chinese: “極客”一詞原指那些或爲人古怪或非主流之人。

sentences.english: So what’s a geek to do to find reasonably priced trinkets?
sentences.chinese: 極客要怎樣淘到價格合理的寶貝？

definition: (music) to change key/modulation/(of an employee) to be transferred to another post
Haimen county level city in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu
the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: fig. people who cannot afford to buy their own house
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
